FIELDS_REQUIRED: The fields nombre, email and clave are mandatory
EMAIL_AND_PASS_REQUIRED: Email and password are mandatory fields
NOT_VALID_VALUE_VENTA: Value introduced for venta is not valid, only true or false values are allowed
PRECIO_IS_NOT_NUMERIC_VALUE: The value introduced for precio is not a numeric value valid
VALUE_PRECIO_INTERVAL_NOT_VALID: Values introduced for precio interval are not valid
INITIAL_VALUE_FOR_INTERVAL_PRECIO_NOT_VA: Value introduced for initial value of interval is not valid
END_VALUE_FOR_INTERVAL_PRECIO_NOT_VALID: Value introduced for end value of interval is not valid
